title: Bug 49235: ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<? classSet is not expecting class
description: Bug 49235: When executing the 'onStartup' method of the 'ModuleInitializer' class, the output is 'MySomeAnn', but I expect the output to be 'MySomeClass'. This behavior is not compliant with the Servlet 3.0 specification. It's important to note that my code works fine on Glassfish 3.0.
OB: When the 'onStartup' method of the 'ModuleInitializer' class is executed, the output is 'MySomeAnn'.
EB: I expect the output to be 'MySomeClass' instead.
